text: Ndithudi ndi osakhulupirira amene amati: “Mulungu ndi Messiya mwana wa mwamuna wa Maria.” Koma Messiya mwini wake adati: “o inu ana a Israyeli! Pembedzani Mulungu, Ambuye wanga amene ndi Ambuye wanu.”Ndithudi aliyense amene apembedza milungu ina m’malo mwa Mulungu yekha sadzalowa ku Paradiso ndipo malo ake ndi kumoto. Ndipo anthu ochita zoipa alibe owathandiza
